Articles.Content: How do you determine the best height for aerobraking? I always seem to be too high, even when I set a 10km periapsis over Duna for an interplanetary course I zipped right by.

It depends on the planet and also the speed that you're travelling at when you hit the atmosphere.

This is a good calculator, as it tells you where to put your periapsis based on where you are right now and what speed you're travelling at.
